April 12 , 2004

Congratulations to Timmai, Magdilyn, Niniane, and Thor-
gum on your promotions to Honor Guard.

Thank you for your dedication, loyalty and hard work
in this guild.

We look forward to working with you.

We realize that Timmai will be away for awhile and look
forward to giving him his full honor guard privileges when
he returns.

Arathain will give you your full-fledged officership abilities
in game. I will be enabling you to view the honor guard forum
ASAP.

 

March 13 , 2004

Jan & Feb

EF and UB clear BoT towers again






Ornate Chain BP Mold
Ornate Silk Robe Pattern

Thanks again, Universal Brotherhood.
Well, we set out to drop Aerdin Dar in PoV - he wasn't up. Terris Thule wasn't up- nor
Xanamech, nor just about any other flag mob. So we said what the heck and killed some
mini bosses in the BoT Towers. Best loot I have ever seen drop with least amount of
death. Rock the heck on.
